post.author: Admin
post.title: Order Your State Finals DVD Today!
post.description:
Dear Band Families,
ORDER YOUR COPY OF THE 2017 STATE FINAL PERFORMANCE (DVD) AND THE MARCHING BAND
post.content:
Dear Band Families,

ORDER YOUR COPY OF THE 2017 STATE FINAL PERFORMANCE (DVD) AND THE MARCHING BAND CONCERT (CD)

CONGRATS TO OUR BAND ON THE SUPERIOR RATING AT STATES!

Want to enjoy the State performance again? Want to enjoy the Marching Band concert again? The Boosters will be offering two ways to remember the 2017 Marching Band season!

In conjunction with SoundWaves of Cleveland, we will be offering a DVD of State Finals (the ONLY way to get a hard copy of the performance) and a CD recording of our Marching Band Concert!

Please complete the attached order form and place your order in the white band box by NOV 3rd. We will only be ordering EXACTLY what we need… no extras!! Questions? Please contact: Amanda Kost: 440-864-6543
